casebody.data:
PEOPLE of the State of Michigan, Plaintiff-Appellee,
v.
Gerald MAGNANT, Defendant-Appellant. SC: 159371
COA: 341627 Supreme Court of Michigan. June 7, 2019

Order

On order of the Chief Justice, the motion of defendant-appellant to extend the time for filing its reply is GRANTED. The reply will be accepted as timely filed if submitted on or before July 1, 2019.
